interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Laloirelle Luminous Face Oil - Organic Pomegranate Oil, Cacao Oil Infused W/Brightening White Peony Root, Marigold Flower, Lotus Leaf - Glowing Skin That Feels Hydrated, Plump and Firm - 1.0 fl oz Review Date: 2020/10/09 Store: Laloirelle Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Scent': 'Pomegranate', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.36 x 2.32 inches; 4.55 Ounces'} Review Text: Oof! I just can't get over the smell of this one. It could be a scent that others may find pleasurable, but not me. I can't find a specific smell it reminds me of...but think a deep nutty smell mixed with the smell of old leather? The scent dissipates a bit after you rub it into your skin, but it lingers just enough to bother me. But if you are a fan of those deep, woodsy, older scents, this might be for you.

I will say, it soaks extremely well into the skin, leaving you with a really nice matte finish that most other oils aren't capable of. Review Title: Scent Is Not For Me Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Women's Pleated Scarves Pashmina Shawl Wraps for Wedding Bride Bridesmaid Gifts (Black) HOMELEX {'Package Dimensions': '12 x 10.7 x 0.8 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Department': 'Womens', 'UPC': '782903598692'} So happy I added this to my headscarf collection. I got the black one but am definitely eyeing up the champagne, brown, and yellow! The fabric is so soft and I love the pleated design. It's pretty long, which allows so many styles to be worn! It could even work as a scarf around your neck! Very versatile. Beautiful & Versatile Laloirelle Age Defy Face Oil - Virgin Marula Oil, Rosehip Oil Infused with Organic Reishi Mushroom, Ginseng, Cordyceps Mushroom - Organic Facial Oil for Anti Aging, Wrinkles, Acne Scars, Dry Skin (1oz) Laloirelle {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.4 x 2.32 inches; 4.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AD30'} I'm a fan of this face oil. I find that I can only really use it as part of my nighttime skincare routine, as the finish is...well...oily. I have another face oil that I use in the morning that has more of a matte finish so I'm not shining all throughout the day. That being said, this oil is not bad. It just leaves you very shiny!

It has a great floral smell and just 2-3 drops is enough to cover your face/neck. Dewy Moisturizing Finish Laloirelle Luminous Face Oil - Organic Pomegranate Oil, Cacao Oil Infused W/Brightening White Peony Root, Marigold Flower, Lotus Leaf - Glowing Skin That Feels Hydrated, Plump and Firm - 1.0 fl oz Laloirelle {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Scent': 'Pomegranate', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.36 x 2.32 inches; 4.55 Ounces'} Oof! I just can't get over the smell of this one. It could be a scent that others may find pleasurable, but not me. I can't find a specific smell it reminds me of...but think a deep nutty smell mixed with the smell of old leather? The scent dissipates a bit after you rub it into your skin, but it lingers just enough to bother me. But if you are a fan of those deep, woodsy, older scents, this might be for you.

I will say, it soaks extremely well into the skin, leaving you with a really nice matte finish that most other oils aren't capable of. Scent Is Not For Me
profile:
**User Summary:**

The user showcases an enduring interest in versatile accessories and skincare products that enhance both comfort and style. Their preference for high-quality, soft fabrics in women's fashion underlines their commitment to elegance alongside practicality, reflecting a vibrant approach to style through their exploration of diverse colors and aesthetics.

Recently, the user purchased a skincare oil that integrates well into their routine, reinforcing their appreciation for multifunctional products. However, they have expressed some dissatisfaction with its scent, describing it as deep and woodsy, although they acknowledged its exceptional absorption and matte finish. This indicates their discerning nature when selecting items that need to meet functional and sensory expectations.

Overall, the user's preferences continue to lean towards elegant, multifunctional items that elevate their aesthetic appeal while prioritizing comfort and quality. Their holistic approach to beauty and personal expression remains evident, as they integrate both fashion and skincare seamlessly into their lifestyle. This blend of comfort, practicality, and an eye for aesthetic detail characterizes their ongoing journey in enhancing their style and self-care practices.
